name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Take-Down: Missions in Korea
summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Take-Down - Missions in Korea is a South Korean-made Microsoft Windows game released in July 2001. The game is not based on the Rainbow Six game timeline; it is designed for the global market but was not released outside of South Korea.
